backend/main.mo: Defines actor modules for profiles, booking requests, messages, monetization, and persistent state, including maps, types, and compare functions.
backend/migration.mo: Provides types for old/new actor state and a migration function adding a new companionFeePaid map.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries of many frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global layout, auth/age guards, and routes for public, admin, profile, and messaging pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSta: Renders a badge showing a companion profile's status using variant and label mappings.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with React Query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting newly authenticated users to enter and save their name, using profile queries and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Dialog for submitting a booking request with form fields, validation, and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/companions/Compa: Displays a companion’s image, name, description, and category in a clickable card linking to their profile.
Image gallery with modal viewer allowing navigation between photos for a companion profile.
frontend/src/components/compliance/AgeGa: Modal prompting users to confirm age eligibility before entering adult content.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Wrapper enforcing admin-only access, showing login or denied screens based on authentication and authorization.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAg: Guard that checks stored age confirmation and shows the age gate modal if not confirmed.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Wrapper that requires authentication, showing a sign‑in prompt when the user is not logged in.
frontend/src/components/layout/Editorial: Layout utilities for editorial sections, including headings, subheads, and dividers.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding, legal links, browsing links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation links that adapt based on authentication state and admin role, including mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Fetches and exposes user authorization state, including authentication, role, and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, bookings, messages, and earnings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light/dark themes and serif font import for the application's visual design.
frontend/src/lib/errorFormatting.ts: Maps backend error messages to user-friendly strings with custom handling for auth, fee, and existence errors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the application.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingDet: Admin page showing detailed booking info with controls to update booking status and invalidate earnings queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Displays all bookings with tab-based filtering by status and a table of booking details with actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEarningsPa: Shows platform earnings, active monetization model, and recent completed bookings using cards and tables.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMonetizati: Provides a form for selecting and configuring the platform’s monetization model and its fee parameters.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfileEdi: Form for creating or editing profiles with fields for details, status, and languages, saving via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfilesPa: Lists all profiles with status badges and actions to edit or change activation status.
Browse page that displays active companion profiles with search and category filtering, showing loading and empty states.
Displays a companion’s profile with photos, details, availability, and a booking button requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and calls to action directing users to browse companions.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesConv: Displays a message thread between the signed-in user and a selected counterpart, loads messages, shows profile info, and allows sending new messages.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesInbo: Shows all user message threads, merges duplicates, displays counterpart profiles, and links into individual conversations.
frontend/src/pages/MyCompanionProfilePag: Allows authenticated users to create or edit their own companion profile with form fields and fee confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page describing data collection, use, storage, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/TermsDisclaimerPage.t: Static terms and disclaimer page outlining age requirements, legal boundaries, and platform responsibilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing or retrieving them across navigations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s current state, feature list, and metadata describing the app’s direction and implemented requirements.
